Description: Running servers are added to Scalr and associated with a Farm Role and Farm. Scalarizer is NOT installed by this process.
Installs Scalarizer onto imported servers to enable the full fucntionality of Scalr
This option will install the scalarizer agent, take a snapshot to form a new image and register the image in Scalr.
This is an extension to "Create Image from Non-Scalr Server" which performs all the same steps and also creates a Role associated with the Image.
